QueryResult.text: SELECT N.ID, N.DEF_RULE_ID, N.OBJECT_ID AS USER_ID, N.OBJECT_ID, N.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE, N.NOTIFY_WHEN_CODE FROM ESC_DEF_NOTIFICATIONS N WHERE N.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE = 'ESC_NOTIFY_USER' UNION SELECT N.ID, N.DEF_RULE_ID, G.USER_ID, N.OBJECT_ID, N.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE, N.NOTIFY_WHEN_CODE FROM ESC_DEF_NOTIFICATIONS N, CMN_SEC_USER_GROUPS G WHERE N.OBJECT_ID = G.GROUP_ID AND N.OBJECT_TYPE_CODE = 'ESC_NOTIFY_GROUP'
